import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import CheckoutSteps from '../checkoutSeteps/CheckoutSteps' export default function ShippingAddressScreen() { const [fullName, setfullName] = useState(''); const submitHandler= (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); //TODO: dispath save shipping Address Action } return (

Shipping Address

setFullName(e.target.value)} required >
setAddress(e.target.value)} required >
